Quick Start Guide

1. Install: Click "Add to Chrome" to get started.
2. Access: Click the extension icon in your browser.
3. Add Time Zones: Hit the "+" button to add time zones to your list.
4. View & Customize: Selected time zones show current times and differences. Adjust toolbar and time format in settings.

- All Websites: Allows toolbar visibility on any webpage (no browsing data is collected).
- Local Storage: Saves your watchlist and preferences locally on your device.
